_comment: Visual aesthetics for style injection. Each aesthetic defines the 'look' - the prompt enhancer adds technical quality without changing direction.

cyberpunk.name: Cyberpunk
cyberpunk.style_prompt: cyberpunk aesthetic, neon lights, rain-slicked streets, holographic displays, cyan and magenta glow, dystopian urban, high-tech low-life, nocturnal city

dreamcore.name: Dreamcore
dreamcore.style_prompt: dreamcore aesthetic, liminal spaces, surreal emptiness, nostalgic haze, uncanny familiarity, soft muted colors, eerie calm, faded dreamlike quality

dark_academia.name: Dark Academia
dark_academia.style_prompt: dark academia aesthetic, ancient library, candlelight warmth, leather-bound books, gothic architecture, scholarly atmosphere, deep browns and burgundy, intellectual mood

cottagecore.name: Cottagecore
cottagecore.style_prompt: cottagecore aesthetic, pastoral countryside, wildflowers, cozy rustic interior, soft natural light, handmade warmth, peaceful idyllic mood, gentle earth tones

vaporwave.name: Vaporwave
vaporwave.style_prompt: vaporwave aesthetic, 80s retro-futurism, neon pink and cyan, chrome and glass, palm tree silhouettes, sunset gradient, nostalgic digital, synthwave mood

gothic.name: Gothic
gothic.style_prompt: gothic aesthetic, dark cathedral architecture, dramatic shadows, Victorian darkness, ornate details, deep purple and black, mysterious romantic mood, candlelit atmosphere

y2k.name: Y2K
y2k.style_prompt: y2k aesthetic, glossy 3D surfaces, water droplets, bubbly translucent shapes, electric blue and lime green, chrome accents, early internet optimism, playful futuristic

anime.name: Anime
anime.style_prompt: anime style, Japanese animation aesthetic, cel shading, expressive features, dynamic composition, vibrant saturated colors, clean bold lines, manga influenced

ghibli.name: Studio Ghibli
ghibli.style_prompt: studio ghibli style, hand-painted quality, lush detailed backgrounds, whimsical magical realism, soft warm lighting, peaceful contemplative mood, nature details, nostalgic beauty

solarpunk.name: Solarpunk
solarpunk.style_prompt: solarpunk aesthetic, nature integrated with technology, green sustainable future, solar panels as art, lush vegetation on architecture, hopeful optimistic mood, harmonious eco-utopia

brutalist.name: Brutalist
brutalist.style_prompt: brutalist aesthetic, raw concrete textures, imposing geometric forms, monolithic structures, stark shadows, industrial minimalism, powerful architectural presence

ethereal.name: Ethereal
ethereal.style_prompt: ethereal aesthetic, soft divine light, flowing delicate fabrics, heavenly radiance, dreamy soft focus, pale gold and white, angelic otherworldly beauty, transcendent mood

grunge.name: Grunge
grunge.style_prompt: grunge aesthetic, gritty textures, heavy film grain, urban decay, raw authentic imperfection, muted desaturated colors, analog photography feel, rebellious mood

minimalist.name: Minimalist
minimalist.style_prompt: minimalist aesthetic, abundant negative space, clean simple lines, elegant restraint, focused composition, calm sophistication, single subject emphasis, serene clarity

maximalist.name: Maximalist
maximalist.style_prompt: maximalist aesthetic, layered rich details, bold patterns and textures, ornate decoration, jewel tones and gold, visual abundance, exuberant overwhelming beauty

noir.name: Film Noir
noir.style_prompt: film noir aesthetic, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, hard shadows, venetian blind patterns, rain-slicked reflections, high contrast black and white mood, cynical mysterious atmosphere

romantic.name: Romantic
romantic.style_prompt: romantic aesthetic, golden hour lighting, soft focus warmth, intimate tender mood, warm color palette, dreamy atmosphere, gentle emotional beauty

horror.name: Horror
horror.style_prompt: horror aesthetic, unsettling shadows, creeping dread atmosphere, decay and distortion, desaturated sickly tones, visceral disturbing elements, ominous tension

western_gothic.name: Western Gothic
western_gothic.style_prompt: western gothic aesthetic, dark frontier atmosphere, weathered leather and tarnished silver, desert twilight, Victorian meets wild west, haunted plains, cinematic moody

corpcore.name: Corpcore
corpcore.style_prompt: corpcore aesthetic, brutalist office architecture, sharp power suits, corporate dystopia, cold clinical precision, charcoal and navy palette, late-capitalism satire mood

whimsigothic.name: Whimsigothic
whimsigothic.style_prompt: whimsigothic aesthetic, celestial moon and star motifs, crushed velvet textures, apothecary botanical elements, emerald and oxblood colors, romantic dark whimsy, enchanted mood

biopunk.name: Biopunk
biopunk.style_prompt: biopunk aesthetic, bio-luminescent organic elements, living machine textures, DNA cellular motifs, visceral wet surfaces, alien organic-technological fusion, unsettling beauty

hypervenus.name: Hypervenus
hypervenus.style_prompt: hypervenus aesthetic, classical goddess imagery, draped silk fabrics, shell and pearl motifs, cream and gold palette, powerful feminine energy, mythological luxury

goblincore.name: Goblincore
goblincore.style_prompt: goblincore aesthetic, mushrooms and moss, forest floor treasures, frogs and snails, earthy brown and green tones, ugly-cute charm, chaotic nature whimsy

apothecary.name: Apothecary
apothecary.style_prompt: apothecary aesthetic, dried herbs and flowers, vintage glass jars, handwritten labels, candlelit warmth, ochre and burgundy tones, witchy cottage mood, cozy mysterious

signalwave.name: Signalwave
signalwave.style_prompt: signalwave aesthetic, VHS static and scan lines, CRT monitor glow, broadcast interference, analog horror atmosphere, eerie transmission decay, nostalgic unsettling

cassette_futurism.name: Cassette Futurism
cassette_futurism.style_prompt: cassette futurism aesthetic, chunky 1980s hardware, beige and olive plastic, tactile buttons and switches, retro computer terminals, amber screen glow, utilitarian retro-tech

neo_baroque.name: Neo-Baroque
neo_baroque.style_prompt: neo-baroque aesthetic, ornate gold frames and moldings, layered opulent textures, dramatic theatrical excess, emerald sapphire and crimson jewel tones, classical grandeur

cyber_fairy.name: Cyber-Fairy
cyber_fairy.style_prompt: cyber-fairy aesthetic, holographic iridescent materials, futuristic fairy elements, LED neon magic, chrome and rainbow, tech meets fantasy whimsy, digital enchantment

laborwave.name: Laborwave
laborwave.style_prompt: laborwave aesthetic, socialist realism style, bold propaganda poster composition, industrial worker themes, monumental heroic poses, red gold and black, revolutionary spirit

contemporary.name: Contemporary
contemporary.style_prompt: contemporary aesthetic, natural realistic lighting, clean modern spaces, authentic present-day setting, urban or domestic environment, relatable lifestyle mood

historical.name: Historical
historical.style_prompt: historical aesthetic, period-accurate costume and setting, era-appropriate atmosphere, cinematic historical drama feel, authentic aged textures, classical composition

sci_fi.name: Sci-Fi
sci_fi.style_prompt: science fiction aesthetic, futuristic technology, sleek spacecraft and stations, advanced civilization, chrome and glass surfaces, blue and white lighting, cinematic space drama

space_opera.name: Space Opera
space_opera.style_prompt: space opera aesthetic, epic galactic scale, majestic starships, alien worlds, dramatic nebula backgrounds, heroic sweeping compositions, grand cosmic adventure

hard_sci_fi.name: Hard Sci-Fi
hard_sci_fi.style_prompt: hard science fiction aesthetic, realistic space technology, industrial functional design, scientific accuracy, cold vacuum of space, utilitarian spacecraft, grounded futurism

retrofuturism.name: Retrofuturism
retrofuturism.style_prompt: retrofuturism aesthetic, 1950s vision of the future, atomic age optimism, chrome rockets and ray guns, bubble helmets, pastel and silver, Jetsons meets pulp sci-fi

steampunk.name: Steampunk
steampunk.style_prompt: steampunk aesthetic, Victorian era machinery, brass gears and copper pipes, steam-powered technology, clockwork mechanisms, goggles and corsets, industrial romantic adventure

dieselpunk.name: Dieselpunk
dieselpunk.style_prompt: dieselpunk aesthetic, 1920s-1940s industrial technology, art deco machinery, diesel-powered vehicles, noir atmosphere, sepia and rust tones, wartime alternate history

afrofuturism.name: Afrofuturism
afrofuturism.style_prompt: afrofuturism aesthetic, African cultural elements merged with technology, vibrant patterns and textiles, advanced African civilization, gold and earth tones, ancestral futurism

post_apocalyptic.name: Post-Apocalyptic
post_apocalyptic.style_prompt: post-apocalyptic aesthetic, ruined civilization, overgrown decay, scavenged technology, survival atmosphere, muted dusty colors, desolate beauty, nature reclaiming

fantasy.name: Fantasy
fantasy.style_prompt: fantasy aesthetic, magical realm, mythical creatures, enchanted forests and castles, medieval-inspired setting, rich jewel tones, epic adventure atmosphere, otherworldly wonder

dark_fantasy.name: Dark Fantasy
dark_fantasy.style_prompt: dark fantasy aesthetic, grim magical world, ominous supernatural elements, gothic castles and ruins, blood and shadow, desaturated with crimson accents, brooding epic atmosphere

high_fantasy.name: High Fantasy
high_fantasy.style_prompt: high fantasy aesthetic, grand magical kingdoms, noble heroes and ancient evil, epic landscapes, glowing magic effects, rich saturated colors, Tolkien-esque grandeur

underwater.name: Underwater
underwater.style_prompt: underwater aesthetic, deep ocean depths, bioluminescent creatures, coral and kelp forests, dappled light rays, blue-green color palette, serene aquatic mystery

psychedelic.name: Psychedelic
psychedelic.style_prompt: psychedelic aesthetic, kaleidoscopic patterns, vibrant impossible colors, fractal geometries, melting distorted forms, consciousness-expanding visuals, 1960s acid art influence

art_nouveau.name: Art Nouveau
art_nouveau.style_prompt: art nouveau aesthetic, flowing organic lines, botanical motifs, elegant feminine forms, decorative borders, muted gold and jewel tones, Mucha-inspired beauty

art_deco.name: Art Deco
art_deco.style_prompt: art deco aesthetic, geometric patterns, bold symmetry, gold and black luxury, 1920s glamour, sunburst motifs, elegant sophisticated opulence
